service_description: Walk-in clothes closet. Come to the back of the church.
hours: Hours: 9 a.m.-noon, Tues.

service_description: Maternity and baby clothes up to 12 months. Free confidential pregnancy testing, doctor referrals and housing resources. Proof of pregnancy documentation (provided by Birthright of Hillsboro) needed to sign up for OHP and WIC.
hours:
Hours: Noon-2 p.m; Tues., Wed., and Fri; 
3 p.m.-7:30 p.m. Thurs.

service_description: Clothing available to those in need. Due to covid the clothing room is closed to visitors, but you can make requests for specific items during these times.
hours:
Hours: Tues., Wed., and Thurs., 1-2pm.
Tues., Thurs., 10 a.m-1 p.m.
Weekdays, 9 a.m.- 5 p.m., while requesting a grocery delivery

service_description: Free clothing for low-income students attending Beaverton schools. Must make an appointment through a ParentSquare account, or call 503-356-4322. Clothing not provided to adults, infants or toddlers.
Clothing & household items. Some emergency assistance.
hours:
Hours: Sun. 12p.m.-4p.m.
Mon, Tues, Wed 10.m.-3p.m. 
Food Pantry Truck on the 4th Tues. every month 4 p.m.

service_description: Free clothing and emergency food assistance within four zip codes 97206, 97215, 97216, 97266. Assistance once a month.  Mon.-Thurs.  Bus: 72.
hours: Hours: Mon.-Thurs. 10 a.m.-1:30 p.m.

service_description: Adult and childrens clothing and shoes. No appointment needed.
hours: Hours: 9:30a.m.-11:30a.m. and 4:00p.m.-6:00pm. Wed.

service_description: Laundry services every 2nd Tuesday of the month at Cedars Laundromat from 6pm - 8pm. Laundrymat dinner is provided. 3 large loads are free, Laundry soap and fabric softener is provided.
hours: 2nd Tuesday of the month from 6pm - 8pm.

service_description: Clothing for people in need. Clothing pantry access once per month. Personal care products (soap, toothpaste, laundry soap, etc.) when available and referrals for people most in need.
hours: Hours: Mon. - Thurs. 9 a.m.-3 p.m.

listing: Portland Rescue Mission, New Life Recovery
service_description: Mens clothing provided from 1-2 p.m. on Tuesday, must sign up between 8 a.m.-12 p.m.Tues. Clothing  also offered as needed to overnight dormitory guests and in emergency situations, 24/7.
hours:
Hours: Clothing 1-2 p.m. on Tuesday
Meal Hours: breakfast 7 a.m; dinner 6 p.m. Socks and general hygiene items available 24/7.

service_description: Emergency clothing, diapers, wipes, hygiene products, mail service, pet food, outdoor supplies provided at the door for women, children and marginalized genders. Showers and restroom use available. Advocacy and emotional support are also available.
hours:
Hours: Morning services: Monday - Friday 9 a.m.-12 p.m. 
Afternoon services: Tuesday and Thursday 1-4 9.m. 
Family hours (for guests with registered minor children): Wednesdays 1-4 p.m.

service_description: Clothing vouchers for $20 for Salvation Army Thrift Store (10174 SE 82nd Ave.) for job interviews or first day on job. Requires some case work.
hours: Hours: 9-11 a.m., 1-4 p.m. Mon., Wed., Fri.

service_description: Serves Oregon Trail School District geographic area. Clothing card for thrift store available to guest accessing food pantry.
hours: Pantry hours: 10 a.m.-4 p.m. Wed., Fri. Thrift store hours: 10 a.m.-4 p.m. Mon.-Fri.

service_description:
Clothing for adults and children, available once a month with proof of address postmarked
within 30 days. Serves east of 82nd Ave.

Clothing closet is closed during coronavirus shutdown.

listing: Southeast Comm. Food Pantry and Clothes Closet
service_description: Clothing and food pantry.
hours: Hours: 2-7 p.m. Mon., Thurs.

service_description: Hygiene items, socks, underwear once a week. Sleeping bags and backpacks on Thurs. depending on availability. Very limited food pantry. Must apply in person at least 1 day in advance. Pickup times Tuesday or Thursday from 1:30-2 p.m.
hours:
Sack Lunches Tues, Wed, Thurs 9:30-10:30 a.m. 
Evening meal Fridays at 6:30 p.m.

service_description: Clothing exchange. Laundry available by appointment only.
hours:

service_description: All services, including resource connection and information on how to get clothing and other items for babies and children, school supplies, furniture, and early learning supports, are for Tigard-Tualatin School District families only. By appointment on school days. Call or email lburton@ttsd.k12.or.us
hours: Hours: 9a.m.-3p.m. Mon.-Fri.

service_description: Clothes and showers available daily. Adult clothing closet is available on Fri., sign up at the front gate. Sign-up hours: 10 a.m.-1 p.m. Mon.-Fri. Resource Center hours:  8 a.m.-4 p.m. daily.
hours: Clothes and showers available daily. Adult clothing closet is available on Fri., sign up at the front gate. Sign-up hours: 10 a.m.-1 p.m. Mon.-Fri. Resource Center hours:  8 a.m.-4 p.m. daily.

service_description: Provides clothing to people in need most days.
hours: Hours: 4 p.m. Tues.-Fri.
